channel.title: Stumped. Protect item prayer, ancient curses
channel.description:
I recently added curse prayers and found out you could use curse prayers and regular prayers at the same time, so someone could use piety and turmoil. Well I used a snippet to fix that but now I cannot use my protect item curse. It claims i'm on the wrong prayerbook. Any help?
[url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/snippets/340561-pi-double-pray-glitch-fix.html]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/snippets/340561-pi-double-pray-glitch-fix.html[/url]
This is the snippet I used. If you would like me to post anything else please ask away!
